sources.title: Dan Candy's Law
sources.description: Dan Candy's Law, also known as Alien Thunder, is a 1974 Canadian western film directed by Claude Fournier and starring Donald Sutherland. Based on a true story, the movie follows a Canadian Mountie who wants to give an Indian a fair trial for the murder of a fellow officer before he winds up being executed. You can find out more about this movie on its IMDB page .
